# 1

```{r}
n <- 1e4
p_grid <- seq(from = 0, to = 1, length.out = n)
prior <- rep(1, n)
likelihood <- dbinom(4, 15, prob = p_grid)

posterior <- likelihood * prior
posterior <- posterior / sum(posterior)

tibble(posterior = posterior, 
       p_grid = p_grid) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = p_grid, y = posterior)) +
  geom_point()
```
